exec: console.info('Setting Access Token(bearerToken) in Postman environment')
console.log('You are now ready & authenticated to make API calls to your new HPE Aruba Networking Central account')
console.error('Missing required variable ' + variable + ' in Postman environment variables. Please add required variables before running the collection')

body.raw:
{
    "profile": [
        {
            "name": "discover-ap-sys",
            "description": "Discover AP System",
            "country-code": "AUTO",
            "timezone": {
                "name": "AUTO",
                "hour-offset": 0,
                "minute-offset": 0
            },
            "led": true,
            "led-override": false,
            "dynamic-cpu-mgmt": "AUTO",
            "disable-factory-reset": false,
            "drt-upgrade-disable": false,
            "usb-port-disable": false,
            "usb-power-override": false,
            "poe-power-optimization-enable": false,
            "mtu": 1300,
            "out-of-service-hold-on-time": 30,
            "lacp": "AUTO",
            "data-encryption": true
        }
    ]
}
